title: House For Sale in Dehiwala
details:
Good Residential Property in Dehiwala (Hil Street)

Very Close to Main Road (50 mettrs)

Two storied house consisting 5 Bed Rooms and 3 Bath Rooms, large balcony, servant quarters

* Ground Floor –

• 1 Bed rooms & 1 attached bath room siting area, dining area, pantry, wet kitchen service entrance

* Upper Floor –

• Master Bed with attached bath room & 3 rooms with 2 common bath room & balcony

Price Rs. 29 Million (negotiable)

Please call for more information

Exclusively sold by -

PAN GLOBAL PROPERTY DEVELOPERS (PVT) LTD
351 ,DUPLICATION ROAD , (next to mahanama college )
COLOMBO 03
